snippet.title: ULTRAFLOW 2 - Trailer - AVAILABLE NOW
snippet.description:
ULTRAFLOW 2 is available on Google Play & iOS !
https://play.google.com/store/apps/de...
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ultraflow-2/id1052872570

ULTRAFLOW 2 is a unique one-finger mobile game that combines the gameplay of air hockey, mini-golf and breakout in a chill and minimalist experience. With only one finger, throw the ball, hit a wall and find a way to reach the end. You have a limited number of bounces to complete each level. Based on puzzle and arcade principles, ULTRAFLOW 2 is all about dexterity and fun.

After the first ULTRAFLOW and its 4 million players and in order to answer the demand of new levels, we decided to create a whole new game with more content and more features. 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ultraflowGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ultraflowGame/
